subject: Shipping
description_text:
Hello,

I was digging through your website and I couldn't find one thing, do you
only ship from China, or do you have another warehouse in EU? I'm asking so
I know what to expect about taxes and customs. Also about the power plug,
does the product come with one that is supported in Europe?

Sorry for all the questions and I hope you have a wonderful day!

Kind Regards,
Nik Terkaj

conversations.body_text:
I realised that power probably comes from USB cable and the Heptic Reactor
doesn't have EU plug, based off the photos. I also found about the
shippment to EU on your website and it probably means that you only ship
from China  right?

If this is correct, no need to answer the first e-mail, I value your time,
thank you very much.

Kind Regards,
Nik Terkaj
Hi Nik Terkaj,    We ship from our German warehouse with no taxes or fees. Additionally, we provide a power plug adapter free of charge based on your shipping location.

Hello,

thank you very much.

Best of luck to you,
Nik Terkaj
